project.name: balloon game
project.notes: This illustrates the use of a deep learning model called BodyPix. It can detect people in a costume and label which pixels are in which body parts. See https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs-models/tree/master/body-pix This project creates balloons that when touched by a hand pop and win a point. A poitn is lost when a balloon touches a head.

scene.name: balloon game
scene.notes: This illustrates the use of a deep learning model called BodyPix. It can detect people in a costume and label which pixels are in which body parts. See https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs-models/tree/master/body-pix This project creates balloons that when touched by a hand pop and win a point. A poitn is lost when a balloon touches a head.

block-definition.s: Body part to color $nl hands and feet color %'hand, lower arm, foot, or lower leg color' $nl head color %'head color' $nl color for the rest %'other color'
block-definition.comment: Reports a mapping of 24 body parts to colors. Note that the order is left face, right face, left upper arm front, left upper arm back, right upper arm front, right upper arm back, left lower arm front, left lower arm back, right lower arm front, right lower arm back, left hand, right hand, torso front, torso back, left upper leg front, left upper leg back, right upper leg front, right upper leg back, left lower leg front, left lower leg back, right lower leg front, right lower leg back, left feet, and right feet..

block.var: hand, lower arm, foot, or lower leg color
hand, lower arm, foot, or lower leg color
hand, lower arm, foot, or lower leg color
hand, lower arm, foot, or lower leg color
hand, lower arm, foot, or lower leg color
hand, lower arm, foot, or lower leg color
hand, lower arm, foot, or lower leg color
hand, lower arm, foot, or lower leg color
hand, lower arm, foot, or lower leg color
hand, lower arm, foot, or lower leg color

block-definition.s: segmentation and pose of costume %'costume' $nl with options %'options' $nl process response %'process segmentation and pose' $nl and if there is an error %'process error'
segmentation and pose of costume %'costume' $nl with options %'options'

custom-block.s: segmentation and pose of costume %s %br with options %l %br process response %cmdRing %br and if there is an error %cmdRing

block-definition.comment: Reports a costume using the camera.

custom-block.s: Create custoume from camera %b and pass it to %cmdRing

block-definition.s: Create custoume from camera %'mirrored' and pass it to %'process costume'
block-definition.comment: Creates a costume from the video camera and passes it the 'process costume' blocks.

block-definition.s: segmentations and poses of costume %'costume' $nl with options %'options' $nl process response %'process segmentations and poses' $nl and if there is an error %'process error'
segmentations and poses of costume %'costume' $nl with options %'options'

custom-block.s: segmentations and poses of costume %s %br with options %l %br process response %cmdRing %br and if there is an error %cmdRing

block-definition.comment: Reports the value of the 'key' in a table that is a list of pairs of keys and values.

block-definition.s: player number at x %'x' and y %'y'
block-definition.comment: Reports the player number at the coordinates or zero if no player there.

block-definition.s: Set scores to zero for %'n' players

list.l: . Score keeping limited to 3 at the most.

block-definition.s: get value at x %'x' and y %'y' from bitmap %'bitmap'
block-definition.comment: Assuming that the 'bitmap' is a list of stage width times stage height numbers, reports the value at 'x' and 'y' or False if out of bounds.
Reports the name of a body part under the balloon or else 'not a body part'.

custom-block.s: get value at x %n and y %n from bitmap %l

block.comment: Not a body part of any player.

block-definition.comment: Reports the red, green, blue, and opaqueness of the pixel that is where the string attaches to the balloon. (Computed using the offset from from the center of the balloon and string costume.)
Updates the score of the player touching the balloon.

custom-block.s: player number at x %n and y %n

custom-block.comment: Figure out which player it is using the bitmap provided by the segmentation model.

block.comment: When a new balloon is created.
Go to a random location at the top of the stage.
Repeat until touching a winning or losing body part or at the bottom of the stage.
if touching the winning or losing color update the score and pop.

scripts.comment: This sprite is used to display the images from the camera that are in the background.

block.comment: If segmentation model hasn't been loaded yet then wait.
Create a new balloon every 'time between balloons' seconds.

block.l: Please wait. Your goal is to pop balloons with your hands or feet. And don't let balloons pop on your head.

custom-block.comment: Create a costume from the camera.

custom-block.s: segmentations and poses of costume %s %br with options %l

block.l: No one is in front of the camera. Or not able to access the camera.

block.comment: Need to figure out how many players there are

custom-block.s: Set scores to zero for %n players

block.comment: Which body parts win a point when they pop a balloon.
Which body parts lose a point when popping a balloon.
This sprite is semi-transparent so you can see the original costume as well.

custom-block.s: Body part to color %br hands and feet color %l %br head color %l %br color for the rest %l

custom-block.comment: Update the costume from the camera.

block.comment: Create a costume where the hands, lower arms, and feet are 'winning color' and the head is 'losing color'.

custom-block.s: segmentation and pose of costume %s %br with options %l
custom-block.comment: Only ask for costume and pixel codes..

block.comment: Is only player so make a list of its pixel codes.

custom-block.s: segmentations and poses of costume %s %br with options %l

block.comment: Update my costume with the segmentation colored costume.
Tell the 'reality' sprite to use the latest camera image as its costume.
Best to reset these variables before saving the project.

variable.name: body part names
variable.list: not a body part,left face,right face,left upper arm front,left upper arm back,right upper arm front,right upper arm back,left lower arm front,left lower arm back,right lower arm front,right lower arm back,left hand,right hand,torso front,torso back,left upper leg front,left upper leg back,right upper leg front,right upper leg back,left lower leg front,left lower leg back,right lower leg front,right lower leg back,left foot,right foot

variable.name: winning body parts
variable.list: left lower arm front,right lower arm front,left hand,right hand,right lower leg front,left lower leg front,left foot,right foot
